DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion specific subject constitutional thinness Women : BMI le equal 17.5 Men : BMI le equal 18.5 Stable weight least 3 month Inclusion criterion specific subject normal weight Men woman : BMI equal 20 25 Stable weight least 3 month No previous family history first seconddegree obesity Inclusion criterion common group Age : 18 35 inclusion visit Normal blood sugar , liver function , lipid coagulation profile Signed consent form participate study Signed consent form genetic analysis Acceptance moderate weight gain 2 kg ( le 10 % body weight ) Beneficiary member social security system . Adults legal guardian , subject unable act freely due decision legal administrative authority , Pregnancy case woman Women without contraception Vegetarian subject lactose intolerance Subjects eat disorder ( DSM IV ) Significant alcohol consumption equivalent 10 glass wine per week Severe progressive disorder ( diabetes , example ) Subjects undertake intensive physical activity ( 3 session physical activity per week ) Significant tobacco consumption equivalent 10 cigarette per day Depression psychiatric condition ( treat antidepressant psychotropic medication ) , depression questionnaire/score Medical surgical history consider investigator incompatible study ( stomach intestinal surgery , example ) Subjects receive treatment may interfere parameter measure : antihypertensive ( blocker , centrally act antihypertensive ) , antihyperlipidemic agent corticosteroid 8 day Inclusion different clinical study within previous 12 week .
